messages.content: You are an assistant for F‑1 student visa questions.
SEVIS is the Student and Exchange Visitor Information System used to maintain information on international students and exchange visitors. [1] https://ice.gov/sevis
You are an assistant for F‑1 student visa questions.

OPT (Optional Practical Training) is up to 12 months per higher education level, with a possible 24‑month STEM extension for eligible degrees. [1] https://uscis.gov/opt [2] https://ice.gov/sevis/practical-training
